author: captainmidnight
description:
This video is brought to you by Nebula. Get a GREAT deal on Nebula now: https://go.nebula.tv/captainmidnight
Gladiator 2 is misses Russell Crowe a lot but still has something to offer thanks to Ridley Scott's direction and Denzel Washington's engaging performance. Still, I can't help but feel something was missing.
Read my comic BINARY SEA on Amazon Kindle: https://a.co/d/9JfoZC0
Music by Epidemic Sound (http://www.epidemicsound.com)
Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/midnightcap
Follow me on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/midnightcap
Special thanks to Andrew Elliott (Stalli111: https://www.youtube.com/user/Stalli111  ) for editing this video.
title: Gladiator II Falls Short
